class.name: RMLServer
class.brief_description: Server for creating and manipulating RmlUi documents.
class.description: Allows direct access for RmlUi document manipulation, including loading document files, creating elements, processing events and updating documents.

method.name: create_document_from_path
method.description: Creates a new document and loads it's source from [param path].

method.name: create_document_from_rml_string
method.description: Creates a new document and loads it's source from [param string].

method.name: create_element
method.description: Creates an element of type [param tag_name]. Must add to the document with [method RMLElement.append_child].

method.name: document_draw
method.description: Draws [param document] into [param canvas_item]. Must be called after [method document_update].

method.name: document_process_event
method.description: Issue a [class InputEvent] to the document's context.

method.name: document_update
method.description: Updates [param document]'s layout, called before [method document_draw]

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Tries to free an object in the RMLServer.

method.name: get_document_root
method.description: Gets a [class RMLElement] reference to the document's root element.

method.name: load_font_face_from_buffer
method.description: Loads a font face file from buffer array. Pass [code]true[/code] to [param fallback_face] to use this font face as fallback for unrecognized glyphs. Returns [code]true[/code] when loaded successfully.

method.name: load_font_face_from_path
method.description: Loads a font face file from path. Pass [code]true[/code] to [param fallback_face] to use this font face as fallback for unrecognized glyphs. Returns [code]true[/code] when loaded successfully.
